name: A Night at Bon´s Burgers
description:
A unnoficial fangame of the web series The Walten Files, this game is also inspired by the video with the same name "A night at Bon´s burgers https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxmTQuG4CAc

Some sprites and drawings were made by

LUCKYCAT [hdshader] https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLup79qZdxP6vQ4P7EaXQOQ,

Martin Walls https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNzZD3otfZVlIdvYYRRqNSw https://twitter.com/smiles_bunny

and

Jeta de Hetty Guats (most of them just sprite edits)

Sountrack

Jacob Woodson https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Sh_75_X9IWaPSNGPFCMgg https://twitter.com/jwoodsonmusic

The Walten Files Sountrack https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB0VQ0mcea_lmHGhQq0iDgQ
